overview: “Surendra Jain is a Managing Director with Sequoia Capital India. Prior to joining Sequoia Capital India, Surendra was with WestBridge Capital Partners. Earlier, Surendra was Co-Founder and CEO of MeraNet, an application service provider offering contact management solutions to wireless service providers and portals. Prior to MeraNet, he worked with the Pentium Pro Design Group at Intel and the Semiconductor Product Group at Motorola. Previously, Surendra worked with Booz-Allen & Hamilton. Surendra received an MBA from the IIM Ahmedabad where he was awarded the President’s Gold Medal. He also holds a B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering from IIT Delhi as well as an MS in Electrical Engineering from the University of Minnesota.” (Source: Sequoia Capital)
